metadata.synopsis: In Shar temple, there is a number of mutilated corpses - justiciars killed by Orthon. But he not only killed them, but he also created various installments of them, put them on spikes, hang them, etc

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A very gory idea of art.
0.context: NodeContext: A bit of sarcasm. It may be 'art' but not to the player (except Astarion probably)

1.speaker: Player
1.text: This orthon isn't just a killer. He's an artist, too.
1.context: NodeContext: A bit of sarcasm. It may be 'art' but not to the player (except Astarion probably)
